mapper.update: update yw_app_api set api_name = #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, api_service_name = #{apiServiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, protocol = #{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, host = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, webroot = #{webroot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, api_name, api_service_name, protocol, host, port, method, webroot, app_id, is_deleted, updated_time, created_time from yw_app_api where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, api_name, api_service_name, protocol, host, port, method, webroot, app_id, is_deleted, updated_time, created_time from yw_app_api
